summary: Adds the Chakra Disruption Blade used by Pain. It is craftable.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][b]WARNING:[/b][/color] This mod is no longer being developed.

Chakra Disruption Blade
==================================================================

Author: esuriddick
Permissions: as long as you grant credit to where you picked up the files, you can do whatever you want with the files. Thanks!

==============================
Description
==============================
Adds the Chakra Disruption Blade from the Naruto anime. There are two ways to obtain the weapon:
1 - Craft it (it will be under the ebony branch).
2 - Write in console \"player.additem 35000d62 1\", without the \".

It was created as a one-handed sword.
As a final remark, this weapon is also possible to temper with.

If you find any bugs or something you wanted to see in this mod, just post on the comments or message me.

==============================
Installation
==============================
Just extract the folders and .esp to Skyrim\'s Data folder.

==============================
Optional files currently available
==============================
- None.

==============================
Extra notes
==============================
Right now, I'm not going to focus on improving this weapon. Clearly, the texture isn't the best one. However, you can improve it yourself, as long as you credit the source of the original files. If you make a good texture and don't want to create a new mod so we don't end up having a lot of equal items in the Nexus, you can send it to me and I'll upload it here and give it credit to you.



Enjoy.
author: esuriddick
